GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
firmware: arm_scmi: Fix list protocols enumeration in the base protocol

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 6e7978695f4a6cbd83616b5a702b77fa2087b247, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit b6f20ff8bd94ad34032804a60bab5ee56752007e. For more details please see the references link.
